title: Slime 20088 Valve Tool, 4-Way, Plus Valve Cores for All Types of Tire
description: Slime's 4-Way Valve Tool with 4 Valve Cores is compatible for all vehicle valves as well as air conditioning units. The 4-way tool helps in removing valve cores and replacing them with the new units included. Replacing valve cores is part of maintaining proper tire pressure which reduces fuel consumption and maximizes tire life. Best of all the process is simple.
